div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 08:35 am CDT

div.div: A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 78. Light and variable wind becoming north 10 to 15 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 40. North wind 5 to 15 mph.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 76. West northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.
